requirement_tested: Implement a stock search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A new investor looking to quickly find information about a specific stock.
user_goal: To successfully search for a stock using its name or symbol.

narrative_steps.title: Finding the Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Emma visits the homepage and notices the centered search bar with placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name'. She clicks inside it to begin her search.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar becomes focused and ready for input.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Information
narrative_steps.description: Emma types 'AAPL' into the search bar, then clicks the magnifying glass icon next to it to initiate the search.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'AAPL' and click the magnifying glass icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system begins searching for the stock matching the entered symbol.

requirement_tested: Provide real-time stock information display including basic stock details
user_persona: An active trader monitoring live stock data.
user_goal: To view up-to-date basic information for a selected stock.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Stock Details Card
narrative_steps.description: After searching for 'TSLA', Marcus sees a card displaying Tesla's name and symbol at the top. He scans down to see key metrics like current price, change percentage, market cap, P/E ratio, and dividend yield.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the stock detail page for TSLA.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A card-style container is displayed with accurate, real-time stock details.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Metric Tooltips
narrative_steps.description: Curious about what P/E ratio means, Marcus hovers his mouse over the label.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the 'P/E Ratio' label.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears explaining that P/E ratio measures a company's current share price relative to its per-share earnings.

requirement_tested: Include market trends visualization and analysis tools
user_persona: A technical analyst evaluating market signals.
user_goal: To analyze market trends using various visualizations.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Default Price Chart
narrative_steps.description: Sophia selects Microsoft (MSFT) and observes the default line chart showing price movements over time.
narrative_steps.action: Open the market trends section for MSFT.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A navy-toned line chart displaying historical price data is shown.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Analysis Views
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to check momentum indicators, Sophia clicks on the 'RSI' tab beneath the chart.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'RSI' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates to show the Relative Strength Index instead of price movement.

requirement_tested: Display comprehensive financial data for selected stocks
user_persona: A fundamental analyst reviewing quarterly results.
user_goal: To access and sort detailed financial figures for investment decisions.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Financial Table
narrative_steps.description: David navigates to Amazon's financial data tab where he finds a neatly organized table listing quarterly revenues, net incomes, and EPS values.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the financial data tab for AMZN.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tabular view presents comprehensive financial data with alternating row colors and a navy-ston header.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting by Revenue
narrative_steps.description: To identify peak earning periods, David clicks on the 'Revenue' column header.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Revenue' column header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table reorders entries descending by revenue amount.

requirement_tested: Offer customizable report generation based on user preferences
user_persona: A portfolio manager preparing client presentations.
user_goal: To generate a tailored stock report containing only necessary sections.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Content Sections
narrative_steps.description: Priya wants a concise report focusing on basics and financials. She checks boxes for 'Basic Info' and 'Financial Data' under content selection.
narrative_steps.action: Check 'Basic Info' and 'Financial Data' checkboxes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected options are highlighted indicating they will be included in the report.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Custom Report
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with her choices, Priya clicks the navy 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A preview of the customized report loads instantly, reflecting selected sections.

requirement_tested: Enable users to select different report formats and content options
user_persona: A research associate needing flexible reporting outputs.
user_goal: To produce a report in a preferred format with specific content.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Report Format
narrative_steps.description: Javier prefers working with Word documents. He selects the 'Word Document' radio button from the format options.
narrative_steps.action: Select the 'Word Document' radio button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The radio button is marked as selected, confirming his choice of format.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Content Inclusion
narrative_steps.description: Javier also decides which parts to include by checking boxes for 'Market Trends' and 'News Summary'.
narrative_steps.action: Check 'Market Trends' and 'News Summary' checkboxes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Those sections become active within the customization panel, ready for inclusion in the final document.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports with professional formatting
user_persona: A junior equity analyst presenting findings professionally.
user_goal: To export a polished stock report suitable for presentation purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Formatted Preview
narrative_steps.description: Chloe has configured her report settings and now reviews the preview pane which shows a well-structured document with title, summary, and selected sections.
narrative_steps.action: View the generated report preview.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A visually appealing formatted document preview appears with all selected elements properly arranged.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Final Report
narrative_steps.description: Ready to share, Chloe clicks the 'Download PDF' button located beneath the preview.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download PDF' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser prompts her to save the professionally formatted PDF report locally.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A UX designer evaluating site aesthetics and usability.
user_goal: To experience a visually consistent and accessible interface throughout the platform.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Design Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Elena explores various pages noting that everything—from buttons to headers—uses a clean white background and distinct navy accents.
narrative_steps.action: Browse through multiple sections of the website.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Consistent use of white backgrounds and navy components across all UI elements enhances visual coherence.

user_persona: A busy executive requiring quick insights.
user_goal: To obtain a brief yet insightful overview of a stock without diving deep.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Initial Summary
narrative_steps.description: Robert searches for Netflix (NFLX) and immediately sees a 'Stock Summary' block featuring a synthesized paragraph summarizing recent performance and analyst sentiment.
narrative_steps.action: Load NFLX stock summary section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A concise, navy-colored summary text block provides meaningful insights derived from latest data.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Summary Content
narrative_steps.description: Hoping for updated perspectives, Robert clicks the 'Refresh Summary' button nearby.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Refresh Summary' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The summary updates dynamically with the most recent available information.

user_persona: A long-term investor analyzing past performance patterns.
user_goal: To study how a stock performed historically across different time spans.

narrative_steps.title: Examining One-Year View
narrative_steps.description: Maria opens Apple’s (AAPL) history chart and initially sees the default one-year price trajectory.
narrative_steps.action: View AAPL historical chart with default 1-year setting.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An interactive line chart illustrating AAPL's price fluctuations over the past year is presented.

narrative_steps.title: Adjusting Time Range
narrative_steps.description: Seeking broader context, Maria selects '5 Years' from the dropdown above the chart.
narrative_steps.action: Select '5 Years' from the time range dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart refreshes dynamically to reflect five years of pricing data.

user_persona: A fund manager comparing potential investments.
user_goal: To contrast key metrics among several stocks side by side.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Stocks to Compare Panel
narrative_steps.description: Carlos searches for Google (GOOGL), Facebook (META), and Twitter (TWTR), adding each to the comparison tool.
narrative_steps.action: Add GOOGL, META, and TWTR to the comparison panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each stock gets listed in the side panel with removal options and populates the main comparison area.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Side-by-Side Metrics
narrative_steps.description: In the main viewing area, Carlos examines a comparative table showing metrics like price changes, P/E ratios, and dividends for all three companies.
narrative_steps.action: Examine the comparison table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A clear side-by-side comparison of selected metrics helps evaluate differences efficiently.

requirement_tested: Offer export functionality for generated reports
user_persona: An office assistant tasked with distributing reports internally.
user_goal: To distribute finalized stock reports in multiple usable formats.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Export Format
narrative_steps.description: Anna finishes configuring a report on Coca-Cola (KO) and looks for ways to export it. She sees export buttons labeled PDF, CSV, DOCX, and HTML.
narrative_steps.action: Locate and review export format options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Prominent export buttons aligned with standard business formats are clearly visible post-preview.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating File Download
narrative_steps.description: Anna needs both digital sharing and printing capabilities, so she clicks the 'Export as PDF' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export as PDF' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system generates the full report in PDF format and initiates a browser download prompt.

requirement_tested: Implement user authentication and profile management
user_persona: A registered member returning to continue work.
user_goal: To securely access personal settings and saved activities.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Account
narrative_steps.description: Returning to the site, James clicks the 'Login' link in the top-right corner which opens a modal form. He enters his credentials and submits them.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Login', fill in credentials, and submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Upon successful verification, James is redirected to his dashboard and greeted by name.

narrative_steps.title: Managing Profile Settings
narrative_steps.description: From the dropdown menu accessed via his avatar, James navigates to his profile page to adjust notification preferences.
narrative_steps.action: Access profile page via dropdown menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: James lands on his customizable profile page containing settings and activity history.

requirement_tested: Provide bookmarking or watchlist functionality for favorite stocks
user_persona: A frequent visitor tracking favorite stocks easily.
user_goal: To save and revisit important stocks without repeated searches.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Stock to Watchlist
narrative_steps.description: While browsing Disney (DIS), Maya likes keeping track of it. She clicks the outline bookmark icon beside the stock name.
narrative_steps.action: Click the outline bookmark icon next to DIS.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The icon turns filled, visually confirming that DIS was added to her watchlist.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Saved Stocks
narrative_steps.description: Later, Maya logs in again and goes straight to her profile's 'Watchlist' tab to see all her saved stocks.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Watchlist' tab in the profile.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All previously bookmarked stocks are listed there for quick reference.

requirement_tested: Include news integration related to searched stocks
user_persona: A day trader staying informed about breaking developments.
user_goal: To stay updated on relevant financial news affecting a stock.

narrative_steps.title: Discovering News Feed Section
narrative_steps.description: After researching Pfizer (PFE), Ben scrolls down to find a collapsible 'Related News' section just below the main info block.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to locate the 'Related News' section for PFE.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A neatly formatted collapsible section with headlines sourced from trusted financial outlets is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Specific Article
narrative_steps.description: Ben spots an intriguing headline regarding vaccine trials and clicks on the article link.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a related news article link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The article opens in a new browser tab directing him to the original publisher’s source.
